typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		timestamp as string,
		time as string,
		user as string,
		device_id as string,
		device_type as string,
		web_id as string,
		android_id as string,
		ios_id as string,
		event_type as string,
		data_type as string,
		nav_type as string,

		country as string,
		user_country as string,
		ip as string,
		created as string,
		id_partner as string,
		id_partner_user as string,
		id_segment_source as string,
		share_data as string,
		segments as string,
		clusters as string,
		first_party as string,
		second_party as string,
		third_party as string,
		all_clusters as string,
		all_segments as string,
		all_segments_xd as string,
		gt as string,
		user_agent as string,
		browser as string,
		url as string,
		secondary_url as string,
		referer as string,
		sec as string,
		tagged as string,
		tags as string,
		title as string,
		category as string,
		sub_category as string,
		search_keyword as string,

		mb_sh5 as string,
		ml_sh2 as string,
		ml_sh5 as string,
		nid_sh2 as string,
		nid_sh5 as string,
		track_code as string,
		track_type as string,
		advertiser_id as string,
		advertiser_name as string,
		campaign_id as string,
		campaign_name as string,
		placement_id as string,
		site_id as string,
		click_count as string,
		conversion_count as string,
		impression_count as string,
		app_data as string,
		app_installed as string,
		app_name as string,
		wifi_name as string,
		latitude as string,
		longitude as string,
		accuracy as string,
		altitude as string,
		altaccuracy as string,
		p223 as string,
		p240 as string,
		d2 as string,
		d9 as string,
		d10 as string,
		d11 as string,
		d13 as string,
		d14 as string,
		d17 as string,
		d18 as string,
		d19 as string,
		d20 as string,
		d21 as string,
		d22 as string,
		url_subdomain as string,
		url_domain as string,
		url_path as string,
		referer_subdomain as string,
		referer_domain as string,
		referer_path as string,
		d23 as string,
		removed_segments as string,
		activable as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(country=="MX") ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(input(
		timestamp as string,
		time as string,
		user as string,
		device_id as string,
		device_type as string,
		web_id as string,
		android_id as string,

		ip as string,
		created as string,

		id_partner_user as string,
		id_segment_source as string,
		share_data as string,
		segments as string,
		clusters as string,
		first_party as string,
		second_party as string,
		third_party as string,
		all_clusters as string,
		all_segments as string,
		all_segments_xd as string,
		gt as string,

		browser as string,
		url as string,

		sec as string,
		tagged as string,

		category as string,
		sub_category as string,
		search_keyword as string,
		vertical as string,
		mb_sh2 as string,
		mb_sh5 as string,
		ml_sh2 as string,
		ml_sh5 as string,
		nid_sh2 as string,
		nid_sh5 as string,
		track_code as string,
		track_type as string,
		advertiser_id as string,
		advertiser_name as string,
		campaign_id as string,

		click_count as string,

		latitude as string,

		url_path as string,
		referer_subdomain as string,
		referer_domain as string,
		referer_path as string,
		d23 as string,
		removed_segments as string,
		activable as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
